name: Munkidori
flavorText: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

previous.name: Okidogi
previous.flavorText: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.

next.name: Fezandipiti
next.flavorText: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.

pokemon.name: Munkidori
pokemon.flavorText: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.
